What are the symptoms of inflammatory bowel disease?
The symptoms of IBD can include diarrhea, abdominal pain, cramping, fatigue, and weight loss.
What causes inflammatory bowel disease?
The exact cause of IBD is unknown, but it is believed to be related to a combination of genetic, environmental, and immune system factors.
Is there a cure for inflammatory bowel disease?
There is no cure for IBD, but treatment can help manage the symptoms and improve quality of life.
